Rule Type: Task; Matter Type: Trademark; Trigger: Task; Logic: 1 AND (2 OR 3); Conditions: 1 When Task :subject equals Pay Renewal Fee; 2 When Task :status equals Completed; 3 When Task :status equals Historical; Outcomes: New Task Create task "Pay Renewal Fee" with Task :docket__base_date__c set to Task :activitydate; Update Task Update task "Pay Renewal Fee" with Task :activitydate set to Task :activitydate plus 168 months; RUL-1747 in TH: File Certified Priority Document; Rule Type: Task; Matter Type: Design; Trigger: IPRight; Logic: 1 AND 2; Conditions: 1 When IP Right :ipfolio__appdate__c does not equal Null; 2 When IP Right :ipfolio__relationship_to_parent__c equals Claims Priority; Outcomes: New Task Create task "File Certified Priority Document" with Task :docket__base_date__c set to IP Right :ipfolio__appdate__c; Update Task Update task "File Certified Priority Document" with Task :activitydate set to IP Right :ipfolio__appdate__c plus 12 months; Update Task Update task "File Certified Priority Document" with Task :docket__final_due_date__c set to IP Right :ipfolio__appdate__c plus 18 months; Update Task Update task "File Certified Priority Document" with Task :description set to A certified copy of the priority application must be filed before the application is approved for publication. A design may be approved for publication 12-18 months after the filing date. RUL-1748 in TH: Annuity - TH - Annual Maintenance Fee; Rule Type: Task; Matter Type: Design; Trigger: IPRight; Conditions: 1 When IP Right :ipfolio__appdate__c does not equal Null; Outcomes: New Task Create task "Pay Annual Maintenance Fee" with Task :docket__base_date__c set to IP Right :ipfolio__appdate__c; Update Task Update task "Pay Annual Maintenance Fee" with Task :activitydate set to IP Right :ipfolio__appdate__c plus 1400 days; Update Task Update task "Pay Annual Maintenance Fee" with Task :docket__final_due_date__c set to IP Right :ipfolio__appdate__c plus 1520 days; Update Task Update task "Pay Annual Maintenance Fee" with Task :description set to The first annual fee is to be paid before or within sixty days after the fourth anniversary of the filing date. The grace period for paying annual fees is 120 days, with a surcharge. 3 When IP Right :ipfolio__relationship_to_parent__c equals Claims Priority with New Subject Matter; 4 When IP Right :ipfolio__relationship_to_parent__c equals From Provisional; 5 When IP Right :ipfolio__relationship_to_parent__c equals Null; RUL-2106 in CN: CN - File Voluntary Amendments; Rule Type: Task; Matter Type: Utility Model; Trigger: IPRight; Logic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5); Conditions: 1 When IP Right :ipfolio__appdate__c does not equal Null; 2 When IP Right :ipfolio__relationship_to_parent__c equals Null; 3 When IP Right :ipfolio__relationship_to_parent__c equals Claims Priority; 4 When IP Right :ipfolio__relationship_to_parent__c equals Claims Priority with New Subject Matter; 5 When IP Right :ipfolio__relationship_to_parent__c equals From Provisional; Outcomes: New Task Create task "File Voluntary Amendments" with Task :docket__base_date__c set to IP Right :ipfolio__appdate__c; RUL-2510 in SL: Renewals - Trademark Renewal Fee (as of to March 14, 2018) (Recurrence); Rule Type: Task; Matter Type: Trademark; Trigger: Task; Logic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4); Conditions: 1 When Task :subject equals Pay Renewal Fee; 2 When Task :activitydate is greater than or equal to 03/14/2018; 3 When Task :status equals Historical; 4 When Task :status equals Completed; Outcomes: New Task Create task "Pay Renewal Fee" with Task :docket__base_date__c set to Task :activitydate; 3 When IP Right :ipfolio__tld_subtype equals GTLD; Outcomes: New Task Create task "Pay Renewal Fee - Year 7" with Task :docket__base_date__c set to IP Right :ipfolio__issuedate__c; Update Task Update task "Pay Renewal Fee - Year 7" with Task :activitydate set to IP Right :ipfolio__issuedate__c plus 2555 days; RUL-3006 in CL: Renewals - Trademark Renewal Fee (Recurrence); Rule Type: Task; Matter Type: Trademark; Trigger: IPRight;Task; Logic: 1 AND (2 OR 3) AND (4 OR 5); Conditions: 1 When Task :subject equals Pay Renewal Fee; 2 When IP Right :ipfolio__ip_procedure__c equals National; 3 When IP Right :ipfolio__ip_procedure__c equals Divisional; 4 When Task :status equals Completed; 5 When Task :status equals Historical; Outcomes: New Task Create task "Pay Renewal Fee" with Task :docket__base_date__c set to Task :activitydate; Update Task Update task "Pay Renewal Fee" with Task :activitydate set to Task :activitydate plus 120 months; Update Task Update task "Pay Renewal Fee" with Task :docket__final_due_date__c set to Task :activitydate plus 126 months; Update Task Update task "Pay Renewal Fee" with Task :description set to The six month extension is not applicable to sound, collective, certification and guarantee trademark renewals. RUL-3007 in CL: Renewals - Trademark Renewal Fee Recurrence (Registered before 01 Apr 2021) [Deprecated]; Rule Type: Task; Matter Type: Trademark; Trigger: IPRight;Task; Logic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5); Conditions: 1 When IP Right :ipfolio__issuedate__c is less than 04/01/2021; 2 When IP Right :ipfolio__ip_procedure__c equals National; 3 When Task :subject equals Pay Renewal Fee; 4 When Task :status equals Historical; 5 When Task :status equals Completed; Outcomes: New Task Create task "Pay Renewal Fee" with Task :docket__base_date__c set to Task :activitydate; Update Task Update task "Pay Renewal Fee" with Task :activitydate set to Task :activitydate plus 3650 days; Update Task Update task "Pay Renewal Fee" with Task :docket__final_due_date__c set to Task :activitydate plus 3680 days; Update Task Update task "Pay Renewal Fee" with Task :description set to Renewals can be requested up to 30 working days after expiration.
